methods: abstract long getItemId(int position) See getItemId(int).
abstract RemoteViews getLoadingView() This allows for the use of a custom loading view which appears between the time that getViewAt(int) is called and returns.
abstract RemoteViews getViewAt(int position) See getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup).
abstract void onCreate() Called when your factory is first constructed.
abstract void onDataSetChanged() Called when notifyDataSetChanged() is triggered on the remote adapter.
abstract void onDestroy() Called when the last RemoteViewsAdapter that is associated with this factory is unbound.
